name: Now Museum, Now You Don't!
description:
Erich thought this would be a routine museum heist: He was wrong. Dodge enemies and sneak through 4 unique levels, and uncover the secrets hiding deep within the museums!

Optimized for keyboard. (Can work with xbox controller, but buggy)

Mouse - controls camera

Left Click - Shoot

Left Shift - Crouch

E- interact

Tab - Open Inventory
